UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Influence of the hydrophobic amino acids in the N- and C-terminal regions of pleurocidin on antifungal activity.
Literature.Author: Lee J, Lee DG

Literature.Title: Influence of the N- And C-terminal Regions of Antimicrobial Peptide Pleurocidin on Antibacterial Activity
Literature.Author: Cho J, Choi H, Lee DG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aspergillus flavus KCTC 1375(MIC=20µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=10-20µM),Malassezia furfur KCTC 7744(MIC=20µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=20µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=10-20µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=20µM),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=20-40µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7 ATCC 43895(MIC=20µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=20-40µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=10-20µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=20-40µM)
